name: RoboScratch
description:
Early demo, but still a lot of fun.

Once you throw your claws out to attack, you can still spin them to get more hits in (one additional hit for every 90 degrees turned). Fight off the swarm of attacking robots to survive!

CONTROLS:
Press W, A, S, and D to move.
Move the mouse to aim and click it to attack.
Press the Enter key to pause/un-pause.
Press the Spacebar to toggle fullscreen.
Press the Esc key to quit.

Credit to griffon_designs for the music
(https://freesound.org/people/griffon_designs/sounds/320052/),
and nsstudios for the laser sound effect
(https://freesound.org/people/nsstudios/sounds/344276/).
